text: :wave: Sorry for the late response! Can you share a link/example?

I’ve confirmed that this isn’t expected behavior for the sitemap in HubSpot. But if you’re using another CMS as well (WordPress + HubSpot, for example), it could be happening from there. If this doesn’t resolve your question, I’d recommend reaching out to HubSpot Support via the Help button in the bottom right corner of HubSpot when you’re logged in. They’d be able to dig into this further with you by looking at an example :slightly_smiling_face:

A good meta description is absolutely helpful to get people to actually click through to the page. The meta description isn’t _always_ the gray text on the SERP, but it often is (when it’s a good fit for the search query). People will scan the meta description and page titles of the results to choose which ones to click on.
the 155 character limit is a suggestion — anything past that limit won’t be shown, so it won’t really help :slightly_smiling_face:
